byline.original: By DENSIE WEBB; Densie Webb, a freelance writer and editor, is a registered dietitian

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: ''LOSE weight safely and quickly without cutting calories - or even counting them.'' That is the promise of ''The T-Factor Diet'' by Martin Katahn (W. W. Norton, $18.95), a best-selling diet book. Dr. Katahn, a psychologist, maintains that as long as you reduce the fat in your diet to about 20 percent of total calories, you can eat as much food as you want and still lose weight.
